verses.verse: כִּ֤י <WH3588> When יְבִֽיאֲךָ֙ <WH935> shall bring יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> When the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God אֶל־ <WH413> into הָאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> thee into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you בָא־ <WH935> whither thou goest שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> in it לְרִשְׁתָּ֑הּ <WH3423> to possess וְנָשַׁ֣ל <WH5394> it and hath cast out גּֽוֹיִם־ <WH1471> nations רַבִּ֣ים ׀ <WH7227> many מִפָּנֶ֡יךָ <WH6440> before הַֽחִתִּי֩ <WH2850> thee the Hittites וְהַגִּרְגָּשִׁ֨י <WH1622> and the Girgashites וְהָאֱמֹרִ֜י <WH567> and the Amorites וְהַכְּנַעֲנִ֣י <WH3669> and the Canaanites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֗י <WH6522> and the Perizzites וְהַֽחִוִּי֙ <WH2340> and the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִ֔י <WH2983> and the Jebusites שִׁבְעָ֣ה <WH7651> seven גוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> nations רַבִּ֥ים <WH7227> greater וַעֲצוּמִ֖ים <WH6099> and mightier מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <WH4480> than

וּנְתָנָ֞ם <WH5414> shall deliver יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> And when the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <WH430> thy God לְפָנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> them before וְהִכִּיתָ֑ם <WH5221> thee thou shalt smite הַחֲרֵ֤ם <WH2763> them [and] utterly תַּחֲרִים֙ <WH2763> destroy אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> לֹא־ <WH3808> no תִכְרֹ֥ת <WH3772> them thou shalt make לָהֶ֛ם בְּרִ֖ית <WH1285> no covenant וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> no תְחָנֵּֽם׃ <WH2603> with them nor shew mercy

וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תִתְחַתֵּ֖ן <WH2859> Neither shalt thou make marriages בָּ֑ם בִּתְּךָ֙ <WH1323> with them thy daughter לֹא־ <WH3808> nor תִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> thou shalt not give לִבְנ֔וֹ <WH1121> unto his son וּבִתּ֖וֹ <WH1323> nor his daughter לֹא־ <WH3808> nor תִקַּ֥ח <WH3947> shalt thou take לִבְנֶֽךָ׃ <WH1121> unto thy son

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָסִ֤יר <WH5493> For they will turn away אֶת־ <WH853> בִּנְךָ֙ <WH1121> thy son מֵֽאַחֲרַ֔י <WH310> from following וְעָבְד֖וּ <WH5647> me that they may serve אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֑ים <WH312> other וְחָרָ֤ה <WH2734> be kindled אַף־ <WH639> so will the anger יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD בָּכֶ֔ם וְהִשְׁמִידְךָ֖ <WH8045> against you and destroy מַהֵֽר׃ <WH4118> thee suddenly

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus תַעֲשׂוּ֙ <WH6213> But thus shall ye deal לָהֶ֔ם <WH1992> like מִזְבְּחֹתֵיהֶ֣ם <WH4196> their altars תִּתֹּ֔צוּ <WH5422> with them ye shall destroy וּמַצֵּבֹתָ֖ם <WH4676> their images תְּשַׁבֵּ֑רוּ <WH7665> and break down וַאֲשֵֽׁירֵהֶם֙ <WH842> their groves תְּגַדֵּע֔וּן <WH1438> and cut down וּפְסִילֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6456> their graven images תִּשְׂרְפ֥וּן <WH8313> and burn בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> with fire

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for עַ֤ם <WH5971> people קָדוֹשׁ֙ <WH6918> For thou [art] an holy אַתָּ֔ה <WH859> you לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God בְּךָ֞ בָּחַ֣ר ׀ <WH977> hath chosen יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> thy God לִהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> become לוֹ֙ לְעַ֣ם <WH5971> people סְגֻלָּ֔ה <WH5459> thee to be a special מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> of all הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> unto himself above all people אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who עַל־ <WH5921> are on פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> that [are] upon the face הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> of the earth ס

לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor מֵֽרֻבְּכֶ֞ם <WH7230> you because ye were more מִכָּל־ <WH3605> any הָֽעַמִּ֗ים <WH5971> in number than any people חָשַׁ֧ק <WH2836> did not set his love יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> The LORD בָּכֶ֖ם וַיִּבְחַ֣ר <WH977> upon you nor choose בָּכֶ֑ם כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> you הַמְעַ֖ט <WH4592> for ye [were] the fewest מִכָּל־ <WH3605> of all הָעַמִּֽים׃ <WH5971> of all people

כִּי֩ <WH3588> because מֵֽאַהֲבַ֨ת <WH160> loved יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> But because the LORD אֶתְכֶ֗ם <WH853> וּמִשָּׁמְר֤וֹ <WH8104> you and because he would keep אֶת־ <WH853> הַשְּׁבֻעָה֙ <WH7621> the oath אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּע֙ <WH7650> which he had sworn לַאֲבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1> unto your fathers הוֹצִ֧יא <WH3318> brought you out יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> hath the LORD אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> בְּיָ֣ד <WH3027> hand חֲזָקָ֑ה <WH2389> with a mighty וַֽיִּפְדְּךָ֙ <WH6299> and redeemed מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> you out of the house עֲבָדִ֔ים <WH5650> of bondmen מִיַּ֖ד <WH3027> from the hand פַּרְעֹ֥ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וְיָ֣דַעְתָּ֔ <WH3045> Know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> therefore that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God ה֣וּא <WH1931> He הָֽאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> he [is] God הָאֵל֙ <WH410> God הַֽנֶּאֱמָ֔ן <WH539> the faithful שֹׁמֵ֧ר <WH8104> which keepeth הַבְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> covenant וְהַחֶ֗סֶד <WH2617> and mercy לְאֹהֲבָ֛יו <WH157> with them that love וּלְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <WH8104> him and keep [מִצְוֹתֹו כ] (מִצְוֹתָ֖יו <WH4687> commanded ק) לְאֶ֥לֶף <WH505> to a thousand דּֽוֹר׃ <WH1755> generations

וּמְשַׁלֵּ֧ם <WH7999> And repayeth לְשֹׂנְאָ֛יו <WH8130> them that hate אֶל־ <WH413> to פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> him to their face לְהַאֲבִיד֑וֹ <WH6> to destroy לֹ֤א <WH3808> He will not יְאַחֵר֙ <WH309> them he will not be slack לְשֹׂ֣נְא֔וֹ <WH8130> to him that hateth אֶל־ <WH413> to פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> him to his face יְשַׁלֶּם־ <WH7999> him he will repay לֽוֹ׃

וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֨ <WH8104> Thou shalt therefore keep אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּצְוָ֜ה <WH4687> the commandments וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַֽחֻקִּ֣ים <WH2706> and the statutes וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֗ים <WH4941> and the judgments אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֧י <WH595> I מְצַוְּךָ֛ <WH6680> which I command הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> thee this day לַעֲשׂוֹתָֽם׃ <WH6213> to do פ

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <WH1961> shall come עֵ֣קֶב <WH6118> Wherefore it shall come to pass if תִּשְׁמְע֗וּן <WH8085> ye hearken אֵ֤ת <WH853> הַמִּשְׁפָּטִים֙ <WH4941> to these judgments הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> to these וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֥ם <WH8104> and keep וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <WH6213> and do אֹתָ֑ם <WH853> וְשָׁמַר֩ <WH8104> shall keep יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> them that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <WH430> thy God לְךָ֗ אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַבְּרִית֙ <WH1285> unto thee the covenant וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחֶ֔סֶד <WH2617> and the mercy אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֖ע <WH7650> which he sware לַאֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1> unto thy fathers

וַאֲהֵ֣בְךָ֔ <WH157> And he will love וּבֵרַכְךָ֖ <WH1288> thee and bless וְהִרְבֶּ֑ךָ <WH7235> thee and multiply וּבֵרַ֣ךְ <WH1288> thee he will also bless פְּרִֽי־ <WH6529> the fruit בִטְנְךָ֣ <WH990> of thy womb וּפְרִֽי־ <WH6529> and the fruit אַ֠דְמָתֶךָ <WH127> of thy land דְּגָ֨נְךָ֜ <WH1715> thy corn וְתִֽירֹשְׁךָ֣ <WH8492> and thy wine וְיִצְהָרֶ֗ךָ <WH3323> and thine oil שְׁגַר־ <WH7698> the increase אֲלָפֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH504> of thy kine וְעַשְׁתְּרֹ֣ת <WH6251> and the flocks צֹאנֶ֔ךָ <WH6629> of thy sheep עַ֚ל <WH5921> in הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> in the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <WH7650> which he sware לַאֲבֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH1> unto thy fathers לָ֥תֶת <WH5414> to give לָֽךְ׃

בָּר֥וּךְ <WH1288> Thou shalt be blessed תִּֽהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> above all people לֹא־ <WH3808> will be no יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become בְךָ֛ עָקָ֥ר <WH6135> there shall not be male וַֽעֲקָרָ֖ה <WH6135> or female barren וּבִבְהֶמְתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH929> among you or among your cattle

וְהֵסִ֧יר <WH5493> will take away יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> And the LORD מִמְּךָ֖ <WH4480> at כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֹ֑לִי <WH2483> from thee all sickness וְכָל־ <WH3605> any מַדְוֵי֩ <WH4064> diseases מִצְרַ֨יִם <WH4714> of Egypt הָרָעִ֜ים <WH7451> none of the evil אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יָדַ֗עְתָּ <WH3045> which thou knowest לֹ֤א <WH3808> and He will not יְשִׂימָם֙ <WH7760> and will put בָּ֔ךְ וּנְתָנָ֖ם <WH5414> upon thee but will lay בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all שֹׂנְאֶֽיךָ׃ <WH8130> them upon all [them] that hate

וְאָכַלְתָּ֣ <WH398> And thou shalt consume אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָֽעַמִּ֗ים <WH5971> all the people אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whom יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֣ן <WH5414> shall deliver לָ֔ךְ לֹא־ <WH3808> nor תָחֹ֥ס <WH2347> shall have no pity עֵֽינְךָ֖ <WH5869> thee thine eye עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> and וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> nor תַעֲבֹד֙ <WH5647> upon them neither shalt thou serve אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <WH430> their gods כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that מוֹקֵ֥שׁ <WH4170> for that [will be] a snare ה֖וּא <WH1931> he לָֽךְ׃ ס

כִּ֤י <WH3588> If תֹאמַר֙ <WH559> If thou shalt say בִּלְבָ֣בְךָ֔ <WH3824> in thine heart רַבִּ֛ים <WH7227> [are] more הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> These nations הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These מִמֶּ֑נִּי <WH4480> than אֵיכָ֥ה <WH349> than I how אוּכַ֖ל <WH3201> can לְהוֹרִישָֽׁם׃ <WH3423> I dispossess

לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִירָ֖א <WH3372> Thou shalt not be afraid מֵהֶ֑ם <WH1992> you זָכֹ֣ר <WH2142> of them [but] shalt well תִּזְכֹּ֗ר <WH2142> remember אֵ֤ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what עָשָׂה֙ <WH6213> did יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> what the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God לְפַרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> unto Pharaoh וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> all מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> and unto all Egypt

הַמַּסֹּ֨ת <WH4531> temptations הַגְּדֹלֹ֜ת <WH1419> The great אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which רָא֣וּ <WH7200> saw עֵינֶ֗יךָ <WH5869> which thine eyes וְהָאֹתֹ֤ת <WH226> and the signs וְהַמֹּֽפְתִים֙ <WH4159> and the wonders וְהַיָּ֤ד <WH3027> hand הַחֲזָקָה֙ <WH2389> and the mighty וְהַזְּרֹ֣עַ <WH2220> arm הַנְּטוּיָ֔ה <WH5186> and the stretched out אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הוֹצִֽאֲךָ֖ <WH3318> brought thee out יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> whereby the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God כֵּֽן־ <WH3651> So יַעֲשֶׂ֞ה <WH6213> do יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> so shall the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> unto all the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> of whom אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you יָרֵ֖א <WH3373> afraid מִפְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> accept

וְגַם֙ <WH1571> Moreover אֶת־ <WH853> הַצִּרְעָ֔ה <WH6880> the hornet יְשַׁלַּ֛ח <WH7971> will send יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Moreover the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God בָּ֑ם עַד־ <WH5704> until אֲבֹ֗ד <WH6> thee be destroyed הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֛ים <WH7604> among them until they that are left וְהַנִּסְתָּרִ֖ים <WH5641> and hide מִפָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> themselves from

לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תַעֲרֹ֖ץ <WH6206> Thou shalt not be affrighted מִפְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> at כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> them for the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God בְּקִרְבֶּ֔ךָ <WH7130> [is] among אֵ֥ל <WH410> God גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> you a mighty וְנוֹרָֽא׃ <WH3372> and terrible

וְנָשַׁל֩ <WH5394> will put out יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <WH430> thy God אֶת־ <WH853> הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> nations הָאֵ֛ל <WH411> those מִפָּנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> before מְעַ֣ט <WH4592> thee by little מְעָ֑ט <WH4592> and little לֹ֤א <WH3808> not תוּכַל֙ <WH3201> thou mayest כַּלֹּתָ֣ם <WH3615> not consume מַהֵ֔ר <WH4118> them at once פֶּן־ <WH6435> would תִּרְבֶּ֥ה <WH7235> increase עָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5921> too חַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> lest the beasts הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> of the field

וּנְתָנָ֛ם <WH5414> shall deliver יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> But the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> them unto thee וְהָמָם֙ <WH2000> break מְהוּמָ֣ה <WH4103> destruction גְדֹלָ֔ה <WH1419> them with a mighty עַ֖ד <WH5704> until הִשָּׁמְדָֽם׃ <WH8045> until they be destroyed

וְנָתַ֤ן <WH5414> And he shall deliver מַלְכֵיהֶם֙ <WH4428> their kings בְּיָדֶ֔ךָ <WH3027> into thine hand וְהַאֲבַדְתָּ֣ <WH6> and thou shalt destroy אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמָ֔ם <WH8034> their name מִתַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> from under heaven לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יִתְיַצֵּ֥ב <WH3320> be able to stand אִישׁ֙ <WH376> there shall no man בְּפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> before עַ֥ד <WH5704> until הִשְׁמִֽדְךָ֖ <WH8045> thee until thou have destroyed אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

פְּסִילֵ֥י <WH6456> The graven images אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֖ם <WH430> of their gods תִּשְׂרְפ֣וּן <WH8313> shall ye burn בָּאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> with fire לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תַחְמֹד֩ <WH2530> thou shalt not desire כֶּ֨סֶף <WH3701> the silver וְזָהָ֤ב <WH2091> or gold עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH5921> and וְלָקַחְתָּ֣ <WH3947> [that is] on them nor take לָ֔ךְ פֶּ֚ן <WH6435> or תִּוָּקֵ֣שׁ <WH3369> [it] unto thee lest thou be snared בּ֔וֹ כִּ֧י <WH3588> for תוֹעֲבַ֛ת <WH8441> therein for it [is] an abomination יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> to the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תָבִ֤יא <WH935> Neither shalt thou bring תֽוֹעֵבָה֙ <WH8441> an abomination אֶל־ <WH413> into בֵּיתֶ֔ךָ <WH1004> into thine house וְהָיִ֥יתָ <WH1961> come חֵ֖רֶם <WH2764> lest thou be a cursed thing כָּמֹ֑הוּ <WH3644> and like שַׁקֵּ֧ץ ׀ <WH8262> like it [but] thou shalt utterly תְּשַׁקְּצֶ֛נּוּ <WH8262> detest וְתַעֵ֥ב ׀ <WH8581> it and thou shalt utterly תְּֽתַעֲבֶ֖נּוּ <WH8581> abhor כִּי־ <WH3588> for חֵ֥רֶם <WH2764> it for it [is] a cursed thing הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he פ
